CustomField.description: US-0009221 - [Ads 2020] Field & Formulas for Revenue Recognition and Compliance
CustomField.formula: CASE( Company_Code__c , "0062 eBay GmbH", "DE", "0075 eBay Ltd. (UK)", "UK", "0325 eBay (UK) Ltd., Australia Branch", "AU", "0111 eBay Marketplaces GmbH", "DE", "0314 eBay Intl Adv GmbH", "DE", "0323 eBay UK Ltd. Branch France","FR", "0324 eBay (UK) Ltd., Italian Branch", "IT" ,"#NA#")
CustomField.label: Country Code
